product_name: Katadyn MyBottle Micro Filter Replacement Element
long_description: This Katadyn MyBottle Micro Filter replacement element prolongs the life of your Katadyn Micro Filter water bottle. Pleated glass-fiber microfilter with granular activated-carbon removes Giardia and most bacteria. This replacement element will work for both the Katadyn Micro Filter bottle and Katadyn MyBottle Micro Filter bottle.
short_description: This Katadyn MyBottle Micro Filter replacement element prolongs the life of your Katadyn Micro Filter water bottle.
